result.name: seawater-temperature-trend-analysis-for-the-north-east-atlantic-north-west-european-shelf
result.notes:
This gridded data product provides a trend analysis to estimate the changes in 
Seawater Temperature at sea surface and near sea bed for the North West 
European Shelf for the period from 1st January 1985 to 30th June 2014 in 
degrees Celsius. Monthly and seasonal trend values were generated by applying 
a Generalised Additive Model (GAM) on a time series of modelling output data 
for Temperature at 7 Km spatial resolution from the North West Shelf 
Reanalysis product (004_009) provided by Copernicus Marine Services (CMEMS).

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network

result.title: Seawater temperature trend analysis for the North East Atlantic (North West European Shelf)
